ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] coolest emotes
ygData.msgSnippet: My favorite emote to use is right after getting a nice rare drop... /em uses a Jedi Mind trick. /say This is not the loot your are looking for. /em waves his
ygData.messageBody:
My favorite emote to use is right after getting a nice rare drop...

/em uses a Jedi Mind trick.
/say This is not the loot your are looking for.
/em waves his hand.

Cracks me up every time.

Draelon Stromsong
(the easily amused bard of the 48th song)

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 12:03 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] coolest emotes


one of mine is my assist key ;)

/assist <tank>
/say How DARE you not like music!? Take THIS you Cretin!
/e bashes the critter over the head with her lute!
/g Assisting point person

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath

> would love to see what bardic emotes are used by list readers...





Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
